overview: Matt Rutherford is the Media Producer at Singularity University (www.singularityu.org), and founder of Roc Noir Inc, a documentary production company sponsored by Canon and Cinevate. Previously, Matt was Web Strategist and technology producer for Charlie Rose (www.charlierose.com), where he focused on the macro themes affecting the internet and the wider world.
